entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
